appDesc.message: Strictly block all popup requests from any website

options_item1.message: Maximum number of popup requests for a single page:

options_item2.message: Timeout for displaying each popup (in seconds):

options_item3.message: Do not block popup requests from same origin

options_item4.message: Block link opening in new tabs

options_item5.message: Display the total number of blocked requests in the toolbar icon

options_item9.message: Countdown for performing the last action (in seconds)

options_item11.message: Comma separated list of host name or domain name for popups that are not going to be blocked (these domains can issue popups on any web-page)

options_item12.message: Comma separated list of host name or domain name of web-pages that the popup blocker is completely disabled
